reviewText: I'm a fan of Modern Marvels by History Channel. This particular volume 8 of The Best of Modern Marvels consists 3 documentaries: (1) SPACE SHUTTLE COLUMBIA - investigates the tragedy, which took lives of 7 astronauts on February 1, 2003. (2) ET TECH - 3 sophisticated probes are sent on Mars for signs of life, marking the latest chapter in human fascination with extraterrestrial beings. The documentary surveys the history of this epic quest. (3) RUBBER - Rubber is one of the most important materials, and nearly all the world's supply comes from Southeast Asia. The documentary explores the fascinating history of this vital substance. Total running time 141 min, in English, no subtitles.
